mapper.sql: order_history_id, order_id, time, order_status, comment, customer_notified
mapper.insert:
insert into jcart_order_history
order_history_id,
order_id,
time,
order_status,
comment,
customer_notified,

mapper.update:
update jcart_order_history
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_notified = #{customerNotified,jdbcType=BIT},
where order_history_id = #{orderHistoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update jcart_order_history set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_notified = #{customerNotified,jdbcType=BIT} where order_history_id = #{orderHistoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from jcart_order_history where order_id = #{orderId} order by time desc
